casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-0585. Klein v. Leis.

Hamilton App. Nos. C-020012, C-020013, C-020015 and C-020021, 146 Ohio App.3d 519, 2002-Ohio-1634. On motion for admission pro hac vice of A. Pemberton et al. by J. Saulino for the Violence Policy Center et al. Motion granted.
